plugin.name: custom-string
plugin.author: Wasim Akhtar Khan
plugin.title: Added custom methods to String metaclass
plugin.description: \ This plugin adds few custom methods to String class. 1) trunc() to truncate a string to some length. 2) ellipsis() to add "..." after the truncation. 3) clean() to clean the string content from all special characters and UTF-8 encoding
